name: Vampliar
description:
Tristen lives a boring average life...that all changes one Halloween night when he goes to an abandoned mansion. There he meets a strange young man named Laurie who claims to be a vampire. 

Is he really a vampire? Tristen sure as hell doesn't think so…

Vampliar is a short boys' love kinetic novel that was originally intended to be submitted to the Spooktober VN jam by DevTalk 2021. 

Features:

7000+ words

2 CGs by Hatoge (1 with 4 variations.)

Lame jokes

Lots of blushing

Trigger warning: depictions of blood and mild cursing.

Credits:

Story, writing and programming by Foxpancakes

Character sprites and CG art by Hatoge

Cat sprite by squidcolas

Proofreading and editing by PyrrhaIphis

Backgrounds by Minikle

Music by Jahzzar and Stefan Großmann

Sound effects from Freesound

Thanks for playing! <3
